tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We really had an wonderful experience with doc Saraswathy and it's all because of her efforts now my daughter is able to walk. The day we still remember by last year our 9 years old daughter had a severe injury which ended up with hip bone fractured. That was a pandemic 1st stage so initially we took her to some ortho doc who dint diagnosed properly din even mind to take physical examination for her and sent us back to home saying nothing to worry. We faced the challenged part of our life for about a week. She couldn't able to walk and tolerating the pain. Then we realised we have to get second opinion. And we took her to Doc Anil. As soon as he saw the child he took x ray and clearly explained she needs emergency surgery and recoemmded doc Saraswathy to us. That was the moment we were totally collapsed and not able to come out of that shock. Then we gotta met her next day for surgery. All the process were done so fast actually. Timely intervention, the way the doctor clearly explain us about the risk factors, her empathy towards our daughter, dedication work the surgery was successful and she was the one who keeps following us for regular checkups. The best part is even our child is too attached with her. More than a doc n patient we could feel the motherly bonding between doc and our daughter. Totally we felt we were in safe hands and whatever she advised worked very well for our child and she started walking. Even recent days we had done implant exit also as per her advice. And she is doing good n we feel our daughter had got a new life. All because of her efforts, passionate towards her profession. Wish u all the best doc. I strongly recommend doc Saraswathy to all those who are in needy.
Excellent diagnosis, explanation and assurance to the patient. Thank you. I would definitely recommend and prefer for future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric orthopedic Surgery,Correction of deformities,Joint Dislocation Treatment,Congenital Disorders Evaluation / Treatment,
review: My daughter (4.5 yrs old now) was born with Bilateral type IV DDH. Both her hips were dislocated at birth and she underwent 3 surgeries between the age of 2 months to 1.5 years, from another renowned hospital. Right hip got clinically reduced but left hip was still dislocated. From past three years, we consulted multiple doctors to find the best treatment plan and got to know about Dr. Saraswati. She was very appealing on our first meeting and most importantly my daughter felt very comfortable with her. So we got our daughter operated under the supervision of Dr. Saraswati at Sparsh Hospital, Infantry Road on 31st October 2022. I am really thankful to Dr. Saraswati and also the Hospital Staff for giving the best care to my daughter. I am also grateful to God and Dr. Harshini in getting to know about Dr. Saraswati (a very friendly doctor) at the right time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are very Happy and lucky to get Dr Saraswathi for my daughter's surgery. She is very experienced and so Professional Paediatric Orthopaedic Surgeon. My daughter went through the Unicameral Bone Cyst surgery which was done by Dr Saraswathi in a very perfect way for which we will be thankful to her from the bottom of our heart throughout out life. 
I have also not seen such a kind Polite and friendly Dr till now. For my daughter Dr. has become her all time favourite Dr. too. So once again thanks a lot to you Dr.üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the only few female Orthopaedic Surgeons in India! While searching for a lady orthopaedic doctor for my mom's ankle pain treatment, I found it hard to find lady orthopaedicians. Later I learnt that it's predominantly male doctors who are in this area of specialization.  Glad that I found this doc who helped us, being very friendly throughout the treatment. She is a friendly, humble and nice doctor who ensures the best treatment and patient care experience to her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: DR. SARASVATI is an amazing doctor **** *** **** * ** *** *** ***** *** I was happy about the fact that how amazingly she explained the process of treatment and the clubfoot.  She made me strong to handle situations well by giving examples of her other patients. Great experience

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Saraswati is incredible. Not only has she taken great care of my baby‚Äôs health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. She made sure she is always available to respond to our queries. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with an outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for the first time, for upper back pain. 
The doctor very patiently listened to our concern and explained in detail with very simple language that can be understood by common people's, the way she explained without using any extraordinary medical terminologies was great. 
We were totally satisfied the way the Doctor examined and explained us the reasons and also advising us the exercise methods to reduce the pain, and advocating the medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Saraswati is an friendly natured doctor who make patients more comfortable especially for children's who make them to be feel free don't worry I am their for you people and make you fit so that you can enjoy by playing. Not only for childrens but for us also she give support in all the way not to take tension feel free nothing has happened I am their I will treat your child well. She is having lot of patience she explain so clearly wat has happened before and after surgery how is he know. We are glad we got a good humble doctor for my child. Now he is alright by the grace of God as well as well treatment from our doctor Dr. Saraswati. Thank you sparsh for giving wonderful doctor. 
Thank you doctor saraswati for everything.
